THREE.BooleanKeyframeTrack.description:: Create a track of boolean keyframe values.

THREE.ColorKeyframeTrack.description: A track of keyframe values that represent color changes.

THREE.NumberKeyframeTrack.description: A track of numeric keyframe values.

THREE.StringKeyframeTrack.description: A track of string keyframe values.

THREE.VectorKeyframeTrack.description: A track of vector keyframe values.
